name: Baby cowboy hat and boots you pick the size and colors
description:
Current production time is 6-8 weeks. Here is a cowboy/cowgirl hat and boots set. It is hand crochet by me. Wouldn't your little one be the best dressed at any gathering in this adorable set. Makes a great photo prop and shower gift too. Newborn size is aprox. 14"

These cowboy hats do not stretch but they do give a bit, so order the size closest to what you are needing. 

Sizes availiable at this price
Newborn
3 months
6 months
9 months
12 months
18 months
24 months
In between sizes also can be made. Just let me know

Please state the size and colors you want at check out in the message to seller section 

This hat brim is made with covered wire to make reshaping easier and has a starch wash. If you wash it you will have to starch it again. Just hand wash starch and block or reshape brim if you need to wash it. 

The shoe sole measures approx. 3 7/8" Sole to top approx.4 3/4". These boots come up high on the leg, so they are harder for baby to kick off. 

The workmanship on this cute little set is impeccable with over 5 hours invested in creating it. 
This is a custom order and your order will be put on my production list as soon as payment is recieived.

**ATTENTION ANYONE AND PHOTOGRAPHERS***

Photography Package. Buy 4 or more items and get a 25% discount off your purchase. Send me back pictures I can use and I will exchange merchandise  with you:)



PLEASE ALLOW 4 WEEKS FOR DELIVERY UNLESS OTHER ARRANGEMENTS HAVE BEEN MADE

name: Marine baby USMC dress blues Marine Corps hat you pick the size and colors Hobbyist License 11324
description:
Current production time is 6-8 weeks. Here is a stunning little Dress Blues Baby Hat for you littlest marine. Won't daddy or mommy just love this  The pin on the hat is of the USMC Eagle Globe and Anchor and looks identical to what's on an actual marine's hat. This will make a perfect photography prop for newborn pictures to match your favorite marine. 

In this example I have lightly starched it to hold its shape. For this price this hat can be made in from newborn to toddler. Please state which size you would like in the notes to seller section of checkout. You can also message me later the recipents head measurement. Also include any changes in the hat colors.

This is a custom order and will be put on my procution list when payment is received. 


The workmanship on this cute little set is impeccable with over 3 hours invested in creating it. 

Please do not leave child unattended with this hat as the buttons and pin could come loose and may cause chocking hazards.

**ATTENTION PROFESSIONAL PHOTOGRAPHERS***

Photography Package. Buy 4 or more items and get a 25% discount off your purchase. Send me back pictures I can use and I will exchange merchandise with you:)

name: Newborn cowboy outfit baby photo prop Halloween costume Dallas Cowboys theme
description:
ere is an example of the cutest little newborn cowboy outfit. This set includes cowboy hat, cowboy boots cowboy vest and a matching diaper cover. Change the colors and add a flower for a baby cowgirl western set. This is a Dallas Cowboys themed set with a matching navy stars on the hat, vest and bumm of the diaper cover.

The hat is strarched to hold its shape and has covered wire in the brim. 

The vest and boots both have matching star on them also. 
The colors are chocolate brown and tan and I can make yours in any color and size and customization you would like. 

Here is a measurement for the hats and sizes. If you have a head measurement you can send me that.

Newborn 14"
3 months 15"
6 months 16.5"
9 months 17.5"
12 months 18.5"
18 months 19.5"
24 months or 2T 20"

This set includes:
hat
boots 
vest
diaper cover


Wouldn't your little one be the best dressed at any gathering in this adorable set. Makes a great photo prop and shower gift too.

This is a custom order and yours will be put on my production list as soon as payment is received.

Please let me know in the note to seller section of checkout the size and color/colors you desire. This is a custom order and yours will be put on my production list as soon as payment is received.

name: Dr Seuss birthday hat photo prop diaper cover and tie included
description:
Here is a cute little three piece Dr Seuss birthday hat Cat In The Hat Inspired Set. Just perfect for that sweet newborns first photos. This set makes the perfect baby shower gift and would fit in perfect with a Dr. Seuss themed nursery. I just love this set and I know you will too. 

In this example I made it newborn in size and I can make yours in any size you like. The tie has a small button and three button holes to chose from when fastening it around the neck.


Let me know if you want to see more pictures and I will send them to you.
“A person's a person, no matter how small.” 
― Dr. Seuss, Horton Hears a Who!
